Blog.post: urlLink How many times have we heard it said, "Oh, Lord, give me a sign!" Alas, too often the reply is vague and ambiguous: the phone rings at an opportune time, a feather falls from out of the blue, a water stain appears that resembles a religious image. We all want to know if God exists; maybe He just needs a reliable method to let us know He's here. urlLink www.yo-god.com urlLink

urlLink Silly isn't it?? This is the proof i was there. Don't even ask me what the white dots are....it was very very dark in there, i must say i was a bit scared.....don't you laugh!!! lol!!! urlLink
urlLink I was looking east, so the sun was at 8 o'clock in this pic. Note to self: Even though the light is almost behind me, what's in front of me is still LIGHT. urlLink
urlLink Today i've learn about light....need i say more? urlLink

Below is my [CLOWN] clan Tag. We play Medal of Honor Allied Assault. We have our own Game server and our own web site. Come visit us sometime. You can download our environment pack, our map pack, as we well as our own [CLOWN] skins, they are so funny. You can visit us over here---> urlLink [CLOWN]

Nothing much so far....i just have to take my camera, and fire away. Since i only got a little camera, i thought i would buy one of those SD memory card, i can only take 10 hi-res pictures at a time before having to give them to my computer, but no i won't take 70 low-low-res pictures like they say on the booklet. This way i think, i can come up with very good pictures, what i realy like to look at and/or for you to look at.
I'm new to this so hang on a bit....i'll do something decent.
urlLink OMG this is ugly....but heck!!!! It's a picture!!!!!! urlLink
I'm just filling space here so i can see what it looks like....pardon my noobiness;-) Update...does the word update count as an "update" per say?? kidding.....

Doom 3 is out...after 4 years....long awaited game by many....but not by me, no sirrrry!!!! I've been burned realy hard with Unreal 2, not to be confused with any of the Unreal Tournament franchise. I mean Unreal 2, the sequel of Unreal...the father of all games....My 1st FPS(1st person shooter) Oh man i loved that game....so much!!! I even joined a clan. My name was (LPB)StalkerTheOne.....we were the low ping bastards!!! In those days cable use to rule the Internet, in my part of the neighbourhood....too many porn downloader got the best of me, then DSL came along.....Thank you very much! -Back to Doom 3 now.......Unreal 2 was a big mistake....wanna know why???? They had the Magnificent idea of putting a so called "plot" into a FPS....what the hell is that?!?!?!?! I always made the comparaison with a porno movie....Is there a "plot" in a porno movie????? NOOOO It also goes for a FPS DAMIT!!!!!!!!!!!!! They destroy a realy good game by adding a plot to it. Unreal 2 citation. Start citation here----------->" You've managed to land possibly the worst assignment in the most boring sector of the galaxy.That’s right, your patrolling the fringe worlds and as such, you're onlyproblems tend to be pissed off miners and corporation disputes. Until one day,you pick up a distress call……" --Back to Doom 3...part deux. Well it seems that they did the same evil/awfull/despicable/awfull again thing that they did with Unreal 2...OMG! OMG! I bought Unreal 2 as soon as it came out, i didn't know about any plot at that time. So God and all mankind as my witnesses, I WON'T BUY DOOM 3.....that's what i was saying many months ago....untill........... I read some articles, saw ONE interview on tv with a so called "fan" with a tie and jacket...i mean c'mon man...wear a frikkin t-shirt!!!!!!!! I became very excited after that;-( I did a 2 outta 3 yesterday with my lucky penny to see if Lucky Penny would let me buy the game in peace..........I WON!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Did i got the game yesterday????? NOOOOO!!!!! I got to Wally-Mart this afternoon to get rechageble batteries for the living room remote(i got tired of throwing------>brand Wally-Mart "game" isle....the sequel. Yup...nothing...no posters, no stickers(so you know it's coming soon)...no card-board standing thingy....last thourough look before i go, with my little 10$ battery pack in my left hand....nout/zilch/nada *sigh* I was looking at a "deluxe edition" of The Sims for 19$+ tax......oh man i gotta get out of here quick.....Hurry man before it's too late...GET OUT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! End.............or is it?!?!?!? P.S.(1) I swear, i never played ANY "The Sims" game what so ever. P.S.(2) I didn't go to Stapples, just in case there are still copies of the game over there...i got to resist. P.S.(2.1) I don't play any console game....get it????????
